Name: demand_forecasting
Title: Adaptive Learning Rate Schedules: Optimizing demand forecasting using dynamic learning rates in XGBoost.
Experiment: In this experiment, we compare the performance of different learning rate schedules on demand forecasting accuracy. The evaluation metric is the Mean Absolute Error (MAE) on historical and seasonal demand data.

Name: delivery_route_optimization
Title: Dynamic Route Planning: Enhancing delivery route efficiency with adaptive learning rate schedules in XGBoost.
Experiment: In this experiment, we test the impact of different learning rate schedules on optimizing delivery route planning using traffic, cost, and delivery time as inputs. The evaluation metric is the total delivery cost.
